您当前已经是最新版本
您当前已经是最新版本
Welcome to the Message Guarder Ad-V11.5.102

Are you distressed by the fact that your personal privacy is not respected by others? 
Are you fearful and anxious about his/her short massages are seen by her/him? 
Are you worrying about your short massages will give out the important information when it is not at hand? 
Are you feeling regretful that you have to delete the massages that have been kept for such a long time only because of the small storage of the phone? 

	All the questions above will be solved by this mobile phone messages guardian, and all the dangers of the leakage of information and privacy will be kept out of the “door”. This tool will make you have less pressure and worries and more comfort and happiness in your work, study and daily life.
\n\tThis application is mainly to protect the privacy and information of the users. So:

A. First, you should set the password successfully before you can continue to carry out other operations. 
	B. You can manually add the phone number to intercept its text messages, you can also import from contacts in batch. 
	C. You can read the messages, recovery them to the inbox and delete the messages which have been blocked. 
	D. You can also synchronize the massages, which have been intercepted, to the mailbox you specify to make long-term backup. 
	E. You can also set e-mail address used to receive backup massages. 
	F. You can also set the boot of the application. 
	G. You can also modify the password.
\tH. Using your mailbox to store your personal information and short messages is the major highlight of this application

\n\tWhen first run after the installation, the system will prompt the user to input a password and confirm the password. After the completed input and be checked by the system, it will jump to the successful login interface, and then the user can continue to do the system settings and check the information and a series of other operations. Please be sure to remember your password. This is your only logon credentials.
\n\tSelect All/Deselect is the shortcuts set for your convenience during the batch synchronization or delete, to help you save time and raise the efficiency.

\n\tSynchronization is to synchronize the information you choose to your pre-set receiving e-mail. If you don’t set the receiving email, the system will automatically select your tested email address as the email address to receive the synchronized messages. Note that before the synchronization, you have to make sure that the system has passed the test of the mail service; otherwise it is impossible to carry out the synchronization operation. About how to test the e-mail, you can refer to the instructions of the mail server test in the following Preferences.
\n\tDelete operation is to remove the intercepted information from the list.

\n\tIn this operation, you can add the specific phone number as a condition of filtering messages, and you can also delete this number. If you do not add any numbers, then the message interception will not be done.
\n\tOpening boot can eliminate the trouble of manually starting the system each time, and it can also in time to protect your personal privacy and information security.
\n\tAfter the successful user logon, you can change your password any time you want to make the operation convenient.
\n\tThis application has an automatic refresh feature. If the user wants to check the messages blocked by the system in time, you can take the refresh operation.

Mail service setting is an important part of this application. You should fill in the correct information of the mail service and pass the verification of the mail server. Only after that the message backup will continue. 
	This application mainly adopts the Simple Mail Transfer Protocol, so you should: 
	First, fill in the SMTP server address correctly; 
	Then, input the mail server port number; 
	Next, select the security type; 
	Again, fill in the tested e-mail account and password; 
	Finally, click the Next button to verify the correctness. 
	By now, you have completed the e-mail service test. 
	If the system prompts you have passed the test, then you can start the operation of synchronizing the messages to the email. Otherwise, you need to check the correctness of the input information and re-test (Note: to ensure a good network connectivity of the mobile phone). 

Here, let’s take the Google’s mail service test as an example: 

⑴、Input the address of the sending mail server of Google: smtp.gmail.com 
⑵、Filling the port number of the sending mail server of Google: 465 
⑶、Select the Security type: SSL 
⑷、Input the email account: ***gmail.com 
⑸、Input the mailbox password: ********* 
⑹、Click Next 
⑺、ongratulations! Tested

\n\tHere requires you correctly fill in the email address that receives the backup messages. If you do not fill in, the system will default to choose your tested e-mail address as the address to receive the backup messages.

\n\tIf you find or have questions when you use this application, you can refer to the Message guarder instructions, or you can also reflect the problems to the author according to the contact ways in the bottom of this page. Thank you!
\n\tWhen you do not need to intercept messages, you can exit the system quickly and directly, freeing up the resources that the system has occupied.
\nThis application supports Chinese, English, Japanese and other languages.
